articles.title: NASCAR Fans Out For Blood Over Stunning Finish, Team Stripped Of Win During Interview - Outkick
articles.description: NASCAR fans are up in arms today over Chris Buescher losing to Kyle Larson at Kansas, but did he?
articles.content:
Well now … that, boys and girls, was a NASCAR race. Whew. 
You know who couldn't do that? The Europeans. Show THAT to an F1 truther and then tell me that dainty little auto league is better than wha… [+6000 chars]
